attributes.action: Allow the vaccination against Bird flu for all free range/organic flocks and backyard flocks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like the opportunity to vaccinate our hens against Bird Flu as they have done in Holland. This should be our right, to protect our flocks against this disease in the same way we are allowed to vaccinate against Newcastle disease and other poultry diseases.
